intro.p:
This node populates a new column (appended to the input DataTable) by executing the specified JPython function once per row in the input DataTable. The values for each column in the input row may be accessed via a val("column name") JPython function. For example, a simple JPython function to sum the values in 2 input columns might be:
val("col1") + val("col2") / 2

dataIn.name: Table that the JPython function will operate on.

ports.dataIn: Table that the JPython function will operate on.

dataOut.name: Table containing the results of the JPython function.

ports.dataOut: Table containing the results of the JPython function.
